purpose: Build contextual trust through narrative documentation of historical shocks
constraint: CEIO provides qualitative annotations only - NO numerical transformation

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: First major recognition that COVID would have global economic impact. Markets began pricing potential supply chain disruptions and demand destruction. Initial complacency shattered.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: China-US trade tensions still elevated but overshadowed by health crisis. Global coordination initially uncertain.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: DENIAL -> ANXIETY transition. Investors moving from 'China problem' to 'global problem' framing.

dominant_narratives: Oil price war: Saudi Arabia vs Russia
narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Double shock: pandemic demand destruction + supply war. Oil crash threatened high-yield energy credits, raising contagion fears across credit markets.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Saudi-Russia geopolitical tensions manifesting through oil markets. US shale industry caught in crossfire.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: PANIC beginning. Multiple simultaneous risks overwhelming risk models.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Official pandemic declaration forced institutional risk reduction. Travel bans signaled prolonged economic disruption. Margin calls accelerating selling.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Uncoordinated global response. US-Europe tensions over travel restrictions.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: CAPITULATION. Forced selling, liquidity crisis emerging.

dominant_narratives: Fed emergency rate cut to zero
narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Maximum policy response. Fed deployed full toolkit, signaling unlimited support. This marked the policy pivot that would define the recovery.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: G7/G20 coordination on stimulus. Global central bank swap lines activated.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: DESPAIR -> HOPE. Policy response beginning to stabilize expectations.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Classic liquidity crisis despite Fed intervention. USD shortage globally as everyone sought dollar safety. Fed had to massively expand repo operations.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Dollar hegemony tested. Global dependency on USD liquidity exposed.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: CASH IS KING. Even gold sold as margin calls hit.

dominant_narratives: Primary and Secondary Market Credit Facilities
narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Unprecedented Fed intervention in corporate credit. Backstop removed tail risk from investment grade downgrades. This was the market bottom.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: US fiscal stimulus package ($2T CARES Act) coordinated with Fed action.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: CAPITULATION COMPLETE. Fed put firmly established.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Novel market structure event. Retail coordination via social media created unprecedented squeeze dynamics. Broker restrictions raised market structure concerns.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Political interest in market structure (Congressional hearings). Populist vs establishment framing.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: EUPHORIA in retail. CONFUSION in institutions.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: First major post-COVID rate shock. Vaccine optimism + stimulus created inflation expectations spike. Growth stocks particularly vulnerable to duration.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: US stimulus debate ($1.9T American Rescue Plan). Global vaccine inequality.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: ROTATION trade. Value vs Growth debate intensifying.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Regime change from 'transitory inflation' to 'persistent inflation' framing. Fed signaled aggressive tightening cycle ahead.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Russia troop buildup on Ukraine border. Diplomatic efforts failing.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: ADJUSTMENT. Markets beginning to price rate hike cycle.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: First major land war in Europe since WWII. Energy security concerns created inflation impulse. European recession fears emerged.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: NATO unity tested. China's position watched closely. Sanctions regime unprecedented.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: FEAR -> RESILIENCE. Initial panic gave way to 'buy the invasion' behavior.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Fed delivering on hawkish pivot. Balance sheet runoff beginning. Market briefly relieved 75bp off table (would later return).
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Ukraine war persisting. China COVID lockdowns adding to supply chain stress.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: TIGHTENING acceptance. Market adapting to new regime.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: First major crypto-to-TradFi contagion event. $60B wiped out. Credit markets briefly concerned about unknown exposures.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Regulatory spotlight on crypto intensifies. US SEC enforcement actions increase.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: CONTAGION FEAR. 'What else is hiding?' mentality.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Liability-driven investment strategies exposed to rate shock. UK mini-budget triggered confidence crisis. Forced selling of Gilts threatened financial stability.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: UK political chaos (PM resignation). Sterling collapse. Global contagion fears.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Second major crypto contagion. Customer funds misappropriated. Trust in centralized crypto exchanges shattered.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: US midterm elections. Crypto regulation debate intensifies.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Fastest bank failure in history. Duration mismatch + concentrated depositor base created classic bank run. Fed emergency lending facilities deployed.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Questions about financial system resilience. International coordination on stability.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: BANKING FEAR -> BTFP RELIEF. Swift policy response limited contagion.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Largest 2-day Treasury rally since 1987. Market suddenly pricing rate cuts instead of hikes. Banking stress overrode inflation concerns momentarily.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Credit Suisse forced merger with UBS. Global banking concerns.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: SAFE HAVEN DEMAND. Treasuries reclaim defensive role.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Market finally accepting Fed's 'higher for longer' message. 5% 10Y yield psychological barrier breached. Duration assets under pressure.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: US fiscal concerns (deficit, debt ceiling). Global rate divergence.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: ACCEPTANCE. Fighting the Fed is over.

narrative_annotations.economic_rationale: Bank of Japan rate hike triggered massive yen appreciation. Trillions in carry trades forced to unwind. Global equity leverage reduced in hours.
narrative_annotations.geopolitical_overlay: Japan policy normalization after decades. US recession fears briefly spiked.
narrative_annotations.market_psychology: FLASH PANIC -> RAPID RECOVERY. VIX spike historically abnormal.

2020.narrative_arc: Black swan -> policy response -> liquidity boom

signatures.attestation: TASK C complete. Narrative overlay provided for 18 major historical shocks. Thematic patterns identified. Regime context mapped by year. No numerical data transformation performed. Advisory annotations only per EC-009 mandate.
